dt: {bc}of, relating to, or subject to the crown

dt.t: there is no {wi}royal{/wi} road to logic

dt: {bc}of, relating to, or being a part (such as a mast, sail, or yard) next above the topgallant

et: Middle English {it}roial{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}real, roial{/it}, from Latin {it}regalis{/it}, from {it}reg-, rex{/it} king; akin to Old Irish {it}rī{/it} (genitive {it}rīg{/it}) king, Sanskrit {it}rājan{/it}, Latin {it}regere{/it} to rule {ma}{mat|right|}{/ma}
shortdef: of, relating to, or subject to the crown

dt: {bc}a small sail on the royal mast immediately above the topgallant sail
{bc}a stag of 8 years or more having antlers with at least 12 points

shortdef: a small sail on the royal mast immediately above the topgallant sail
a stag of 8 years or more having antlers with at least 12 points

dt: {bc}the third tine above the base of a stag's antler

shortdef: the third tine above the base of a stag's antler

dt: {bc}a straight flush having an ace as the highest card {dx}see {dxt|poker|poker|illustration}{/dx}

shortdef: a straight flush having an ace as the highest card

dt: {bc}a type of {d_link|icing|icing:1} composed of sugar, egg whites, and sometimes flavoring or coloring that dries to a hard glaze and is used for decorating baked goods

dt.t: {wi}Royal icing{/wi}, made primarily of sifted confectioners' sugar and egg whites or meringue powder … dries hard with a glossy sheen, making it ideal for decorating cutout cookies.
To make cookies look like buttons, use frosting of choice (such as {wi}royal icing{/wi} or icing in a tube) to pipe four small dots onto the peanut butter cups.

shortdef: a type of icing composed of sugar, egg whites, and sometimes flavoring or coloring that dries to a hard glaze and is used for decorating baked goods

dt: {bc}a highly nutritious secretion of the pharyngeal glands of the honeybee that is fed to the very young larvae in a colony and to all queen larvae

shortdef: a highly nutritious secretion of the pharyngeal glands of the honeybee that is fed to the very young larvae in a colony and to all queen larvae

dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Roystonea{/it}) of palms chiefly of the Caribbean region
{bc}a tall graceful pinnate-leaved palm ({it}R. regia{/it}) native to Cuba that is widely planted for ornament

shortdef: any of a genus (Roystonea) of palms chiefly of the Caribbean region; especially : a tall graceful pinnate-leaved palm (R. regia) native to Cuba that is widely planted for ornament

dt: {bc}a showy Madagascan tree ({it}Delonix regia{/it} synonym {it}Poinciana regia{/it}) widely planted for its immense racemes of scarlet and orange flowers

shortdef: a showy Madagascan tree (Delonix regia synonym Poinciana regia) widely planted for its immense racemes of scarlet and orange flowers —called also flamboyant, peacock flower
